ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - AD Global Repository
MWS2R2 - AD Rename Computer
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Rename Computer # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: COMPONENTID, INSTANCEID # Description: # # Renames a computer based on MWS2 naming standard # Registers the computername and IP address in the key value store # Downloads common and computer specific files from the deployment file share # Resets the local administrator account password to a random value # Registers the password in the key value share # Updates the instance name in AWS
. .\GlobalRepository.ps1
$ComponentID = $COMPONENTID $InstanceID = $INSTANCEID
$CustomerID = (get-globalvariable "Global/CustomerID").value $LocationID = (get-globalvariable "Global/LocationID").value
$Computername = $($CustomerID + $ComponentID + $LocationID + $InstanceID + "W") write-output "Setting computername to $Computername" Rename-Computer -NewName $Computername -force
write-output "Storing IP Address in key value store" $key = 'Network/{0}' -f $Computername $ip = Get-NetIPAddress | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.AddressFamily -eq "IPv4" } | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.IPAddress -ne "127.0.0.1"} $ipa = $ip.IPAddress Set-globalvariable $key $ipa
write-output "Downloading common files and computer files from repository"
get-files "$ComponentID$InstanceID"
write-output "Resetting local administrator password" . .\New-RandomPassword.ps1 $password = new-randompassword -PasswordLength 10 $adminUser = [ADSI] "WinNT://./SOE-LOAD,User" $adminUser.SetPassword($password) Set-globalvariable "Administrator/$Computername" $password
#register name tag #write-output "Registering AWS name tag" #$aid = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id #$uri = "http://10.0.0.23:5000/p1/" + $aid + "?tagname=" + $Computername #Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $uri -Method Put
write-output "Restarting computer"

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - AD Add To Domain
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Add to Domain # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: None # Description: # # Adds a computer to the MWS2 Resource Domain
. .\GlobalRepository.ps1
$domainname = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainFQDN").value $domainNB = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainNetBIOS").value $short_username = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentUsername").value $username = "$domainNB\$short_username" $password = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentPassword").value $dn = (get-globalvariable "AD\DistinguishedName").value
$pdns = (get-globalvariable "AD\PrimaryDNS").value $sdns = (get-globalvariable "AD\SecondaryDNS").value
$computername = $env:COMPUTERNAME $ouPath = "OU=servers,OU=customer,$dn"
if ($computername.ToLower().Contains("dbs")){ $ouPath="OU=Database,$ouPath" }
if ($computername.ToLower().Contains("mas")){ $ouPath="OU=Exchange,$ouPath" }
$na=Get-NetAdapter -Physical | where status -eq 'up' Set-DnsClientServerAddress -InterfaceIndex $na.ifIndex -ServerAddresses ($pdns,$sdns)
$secure_pwd = convertto-securestring $password -asplaintext -force $djcred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ` -argumentlist $username, $secure_pwd
Add-Computer -DomainName $domainname -Credential $djcred -OUPath $ouPath -Force write-output "Joined domain."

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - AD Rename and Add to Domain
MWS2R2 - Get App Files
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Copies application files from the nominated network share to the target VM.
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# MWS2 - Get App Files ############################################################## # Author: Marina Krynina # Desc: Deploys installation files onto the target server ############################################################################################
# Mandatory heading # Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\VariableUtility.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1
######################################################################### # Main # - Deploys installation files onto the target server ######################################################################### try { $scriptPath = $env:USERPROFILE . .\LoggingV2.ps1 $true $scriptPath "GetAppFiles.ps1"
log "INFO: Getting variables values or setting defaults if the variables are not populated." $sourceFolders = (Get-VariableValue $SOURCE "" $false)
foreach($srcFolder in ($sourceFolders.Replace(" ", "")).Split(",")) { log "INFO: Deploying $srcFolder folder onto the target VM" get-appfiles $srcFolder }
log "INFO: Finished $msg."
exit 0 } catch { $ex = $_.Exception | format-list | Out-String log "ERROR: Exception occurred `nException Message: $ex"
exit 1 }

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SOURCE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Folder on a network share where install files and supporting scripts are stored. The content of the folder will be copied onto a target server.

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Extract App Files
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Extracts ISO, ZIP application files using 7zip in the given folder including subfolders
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# MWS2R2 - Extract App Files ############################################################### # Author: Marina Krynina # Desc: Extracts application files (ISO, ZIP) ############################################################################################
# Mandatory heading # Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\VariableUtility.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1
######################################################################### # Main ######################################################################### try { # Folder structure in the Global Repository # \Global Repository # \$SOURCE, folder name in the Global Repository
# Folder structure on VM # C:\Users\InstallerAccount # \$INSTALL_MEDIA - the content of the isntall media will be extracted here
$scriptPath = $env:USERPROFILE . .\LoggingV2.ps1 $true $scriptPath "ExtractAppFiles.ps1"
log "INFO: Getting variables values or setting defaults if the variables are not populated." $installMedia = (Get-VariableValue $INSTALL_MEDIA "" $false)
# Extracting $msg = "Extracting application installation files" log "INFO: Starting $msg"
# 7za920.exe does not support ISO files, 7z.exe does. # 7z files are located in the Common folder and copied by default $extractionTool = "$scriptPath\7z.exe"
foreach($srcFolder in ($installMedia.Replace(" ", "")).Split(",")) {
if (([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($installMedia)) -eq $true) { $installMediaSource = "$scriptPath" } else { $installMediaSource = "$scriptPath\$srcFolder" }
Extract $extractionTool $installMediaSource }
log "INFO: Finished $msg."
exit 0 } catch { $ex = $_.Exception | format-list | Out-String log "ERROR: Exception occurred `nException Message: $ex"
exit 1 }

ns1:variable.ns1:name: INSTALL_MEDIA
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Folder name where installation media is located.

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SharePoint SQL2012SP1Std install
MWS2R2 - AD Add To Domain
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Add to Domain # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: None # Description: # # Adds a computer to the MWS2 Resource Domain
. .\GlobalRepository.ps1
$domainname = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainFQDN").value $domainNB = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainNetBIOS").value $short_username = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentUsername").value $username = "$domainNB\$short_username" $password = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentPassword").value $dn = (get-globalvariable "AD\DistinguishedName").value
$pdns = (get-globalvariable "AD\PrimaryDNS").value $sdns = (get-globalvariable "AD\SecondaryDNS").value
$computername = $env:COMPUTERNAME $ouPath = "OU=servers,OU=customer,$dn"
if ($computername.ToLower().Contains("dbs")){ $ouPath="OU=Database,$ouPath" }
if ($computername.ToLower().Contains("mas")){ $ouPath="OU=Exchange,$ouPath" }
$na=Get-NetAdapter -Physical | where status -eq 'up' Set-DnsClientServerAddress -InterfaceIndex $na.ifIndex -ServerAddresses ($pdns,$sdns)
$secure_pwd = convertto-securestring $password -asplaintext -force $djcred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ` -argumentlist $username, $secure_pwd
Add-Computer -DomainName $domainname -Credential $djcred -OUPath $ouPath -Force write-output "Joined domain."

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - AD Rename Computer
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Rename Computer # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: COMPONENTID, INSTANCEID # Description: # # Renames a computer based on MWS2 naming standard # Registers the computername and IP address in the key value store # Downloads common and computer specific files from the deployment file share # Resets the local administrator account password to a random value # Registers the password in the key value share # Updates the instance name in AWS
. .\GlobalRepository.ps1
$ComponentID = $COMPONENTID $InstanceID = $INSTANCEID
$CustomerID = (get-globalvariable "Global/CustomerID").value $LocationID = (get-globalvariable "Global/LocationID").value
$Computername = $($CustomerID + $ComponentID + $LocationID + $InstanceID + "W") write-output "Setting computername to $Computername" Rename-Computer -NewName $Computername -force
write-output "Storing IP Address in key value store" $key = 'Network/{0}' -f $Computername $ip = Get-NetIPAddress | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.AddressFamily -eq "IPv4" } | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.IPAddress -ne "127.0.0.1"} $ipa = $ip.IPAddress Set-globalvariable $key $ipa
write-output "Downloading common files and computer files from repository"
get-files "$ComponentID$InstanceID"
write-output "Resetting local administrator password" . .\New-RandomPassword.ps1 $password = new-randompassword -PasswordLength 10 $adminUser = [ADSI] "WinNT://./SOE-LOAD,User" $adminUser.SetPassword($password) Set-globalvariable "Administrator/$Computername" $password
#register name tag #write-output "Registering AWS name tag" #$aid = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id #$uri = "http://10.0.0.23:5000/p1/" + $aid + "?tagname=" + $Computername #Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $uri -Method Put
write-output "Restarting computer"
